fields.description:
The Application is running fine on the device using  speech kit Module.Publishing validation is successful. Uploading to Appstore  "Invalid bundle structure" [error|https://c.na10.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00PF000000UlC6I] is noticed. 

*Drop Box links of the project*: https://www.dropbox.com/s/3qw5odxe0oq9l6t/Archive%202.zip?dl=0 
Archive file contains  source codes and also attached screenshots for iOS upload error .


*Environment:*
Titanium SDK : 5.0.2GA 
iPhone applicaiton 

*Steps to reproduce :*
1) Publish the TacmespeechKit 
2) Xcode - Validate the archve project 
3) Xcode - Upload to App Store
fields.summary: Speechkit Module provides error in Ios Appstore submission
